title: "logit"
format: docx

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(mosaic)
library(sjmisc)
library(jtools)
library(kableExtra)

ukhls <- readRDS(url("https://cgmoreh.github.io/SOC2069/SOC2069-Statistical-analysis/ukhls_w8.rds"))
```



```{r}

frq(ukhls$smoker, out="viewer")

frq(ukhls$urban_dv, out="viewer")

frq(ukhls$hiqual_dv, out = "viewer")

summary(ukhls$fimnnet_dv) %>% t() %>% kable()
```


```{r}
glm(smoker ~ fimnnet_dv + hiqual_dv + urban_dv, family = binomial, data = ukhls) %>% 
  jtools::summ(digits=3, out="html")
```
